1.1.name: wordpress/icheckmovies-widget
1.1.description:
This is a widget that loads recent movies checked on iCheckMovies (http://www.icheckmovies.com/) and display their nice covers.

You'll need to have a profile on iCheckMovies website, use this site to track your seen movies. If you don't know the site you should check it because is really nice.

More info: iCheckMovies Widget
